name: Clean Break
description:
A simple two-player competitive version of Breakout!  Simply prevent the ball from striking your bricks while guiding it towards your opponent's bricks!

Controls:

Player 1 uses the Up and Down Arrows to control their paddle

Player 2 uses the W and S keys to control their paddle

Known Bugs:

  • The tops of the paddles do not get along with the ball
  • The ball occasionally gets stuck on the bottom of the level.  It tends to get itself unstuck if left alone for a few seconds though.
